explanation: [0-0] A man in a blue short-sleeved shirt is crouching in a bedroom, with a mobile phone on the white bedside table to his right. The phone's blue screen displays a timer at 00:00. The man's right index finger is extended and touching the phone screen. The floor is covered with a brown carpet. To the right is a wrinkled bed with white sheets, a white pillow on the right side of the bed. The white door on the left is open, while the door on the right is closed. The closed door has white striped decorations on the right, and a picture frame above it.
[0-2] The man then starts the timer, uses his right arm to support himself on the bed, jumps over the bed, and quickly runs out the open door.
